meanings.definition: The state or quality of being knowledgeable or aware.
meanings.sent1: Her knowingnesses about plants helped her create a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent2: His knowingnesses of history made him a great storyteller.
meanings.sent3: The knowingnesses of the cat about the mouse's hiding spot was impressive.
meanings.sent4: The knowingnesses of the detective led to the discovery of the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's knowingnesses of math concepts made learning easy for the students.

meanings.definition: The act of possessing knowledge or understanding.
meanings.sent1: The knowingnesses of the scientist led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent2: She shared her knowingnesses of cooking with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The knowingnesses of the child about the surprise party was adorable.
meanings.sent4: His knowingnesses of the city's shortcuts saved him a lot of time.
meanings.sent5: The knowingnesses of the author about storytelling techniques made the book captivating.
